name: B-B0 The Delivery Bot
description:
BTDB is a 2D puzzle platformer game that will leave you truly feeling like a delivery bot.

The future is now, all delivery companies have opted into automated delivery services. YOU are a part of that service, a mere tool at the hands of a giant delivery company.

As B-B0, the Delivery Bot, your responsibilities are :

  • NAVIGATING LEVELS, PUZZLES, AND TRAPS TO SAFELY GET FROM POINT A TO POINT B.

    delivering packages won't be easy, there's always gonna be something in your way...

  • DELIVERING YOUR DESIGNATED PACKAGES AS FAST AS POSSIBLE

    time is money, no one likes a late delivery. impress your customers by delivering their package right on time.

  • GETTING RID OF YOUR COMPETITION

    you will be the greatest delivery bot there is! even if that means ridding of all your competitors.
